body_html:
The supervisor dashboard redirects to the activity page to show the status updates of the team.
The problem occurs with the activity page.

It looks like there are two problems here.

  1. The feed entries are trying to load pictures on AWS S3 and don't get access.

  2. Team id 338 is the only team where the activities try to get access to other teams' feed entries 🤔

I did not figure out yet what the source of the problem(s) are. Tips that gives me a direction are welcome!
( @carpodaster , @klappradla )
body_text:
The supervisor dashboard redirects to the activity page to show the status updates of the team.
The problem occurs with the activity page.
It looks like there are two problems here.


The feed entries are trying to load pictures on AWS S3 and don't get access.



Team id 338 is the only team where the activities try to get access to other teams' feed entries 🤔



I did not figure out yet what the source of the problem(s) are. Tips that gives me a direction are welcome!
( @carpodaster , @klappradla  )
body:
The supervisor dashboard redirects to the activity page to show the status updates of the team. 
The problem occurs with the activity page. 

It looks like there are two problems here.  
1) The feed entries are trying to load pictures on AWS S3 and don't get access.
![feed entry aws](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6314687/30393728-4d761dd6-98c1-11e7-9154-a9306e399a15.png)


 2) Team id 338 is the _only_ team where the activities try to get access to other teams' feed entries 🤔 
![activities team 338](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6314687/30393905-cca0d448-98c1-11e7-8734-6630a95ead63.png)



I did not figure out yet what the source of the problem(s) are. Tips that gives me a direction are welcome!
( @carpodaster , @klappradla  )
